title:
Finite simple groups acting with fixity 4 and their occurrence as groups
  of automorphisms of Riemann surfaces
abstract:
In previous work, all finite simple groups that act with fixity 4 have been
classified. In this article we investigate which ones of these groups act
faithfully on a compact Riemann surface of genus at least 2 with fixity four in
total and in such a way that fixity 4 is exhibited on at least one orbit.
